text: Allah ashoboza ba bandi bemeye kuvuga ijambo rihamye (ari ryo guhamya ko nta yindi mana ikwiye gusengwa by’ukuri uretse Allah, no guhamya ko Muhamadi ari Intumwa yayo) mu buzima bwo ku isi, ndetse no mu buzima bwa nyuma (bakabasha gusubiza neza ibibazo by’abamalayika mu mva). Kandi Allah arekera mu buyobe inkozi z’ibibi, ndetse Allah akora icyo ashaka
